about_the_game:
Run away from the mysterious monsters "PIEN" and "PAON"!
A pop and cute horror game!

■About this game
The 3D horror game "PIEN" and its sequel "PAON - BEYOND THE PIEN -" were released on the author's personal website in 2020 and caused a sensation in various places.
These two games are now available for the first time on Steam as a single package!
This Steam version includes extra elements that were not in the original version, as well as improvements to the ease of play.

■Included titles
1."PIEN" / Explore a spooky abandoned house without being detected by the mysterious monster "PIEN"!
2. "PAON - BEYOND THE PIEN -" / The monster beyond the PIEN, "PAON," appears!

■Game Features
  • The objective of the game is to erase the "signs" scattered on the walls of the stage by illuminating them with a flashlight and chanting "PIEN".
  • While you are being chased by PIEN, a very unique song "Song of "PIEN"" will be played.
  • The new "Custom" feature allows you to add your own favorite images to the game.
  • If you clear both PIEN and PAON, you will be able to play an extra game.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains mild nudity and violent language. please be aware.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 （64-bit）
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4130 or Core™ i5-3470 or AMD FX™-6100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 OR AMD RX 5500 XT (VRAM 6 GB OR HIGHER)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 10 （64-bit）
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-8300

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 OR AMD RX 5600 XT (VRAM 6 GB OR HIGHER)
